articles.author: Jill Martin
articles.title: Frances Tiafoe to face Taylor Fritz in US Open semifinals, guaranteeing an American man will reach the final - CNN
articles.description: No American man has won a grand slam singles title since Andy Roddick at the 2003 US Open – but there is now a chance that drought could end this weekend.
articles.content:
No American man has won a grand slam singles title since Andy Roddick at the 2003 US Open but there is now a chance that drought could end this weekend.

articles.author: Fenit Nirappil
articles.title: Coronavirus vaccines, once free, are now pricey for uninsured people - The Washington Post
articles.description: The elimination of the Bridge Access Program means some low-income Americans must pay up to $200 for an updated shot.
articles.content:
As updated coronavirus vaccines hit U.S. pharmacy shelves, adults without health insurance are discovering the shots are no longer free, instead costing up to $200.
